channel.title: [711] How to add PKP system & PKP shop BE FAST [ REWARD ]
channel.description:
I want a PKP System, so you get 5 pkp per kill, and a shop where you can buy item from pkp, I can add the items by myself.
FIRST HELPER WILL GET FREE MOD ON MY SERVER!
